section.title: Preconfiguring with Managed IT Packages
section.para: These packages are nightly builds of Diablo packages for Oneiric provided by Managed IT. First, ensure you have python-software-properties installed, and then you need to add the repository:
section.literallayout: sudo apt-get install python-software-properties sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:managedit/openstack
